caption.p: Relative expression of selected miRNAs (miR398b, miR530-5p, miR820c, miR396h, miR529b, miR2055, miR2106, miR166c-3p, miR2877) as per NGS data (Log2 fold-change) (black bar) and relative transcript levels in qRT-PCR (grey bar) ( a), relative transcript level of 5 miRNAs (miR398b, miR530-5p, miR820c, miR2106, miR2877) on 0Â day ( b), 6 miRNAs (miR396h, miR398b, miR529b, miR820c, miR2055, miR2106) on day 5 ( c) and 8 miRNAs (miR166c-3p, miR396h, miR398b, miR529b, miR820c, miR2055, miR2106, miR2877) on day 10 ( d) post-anthesis in the apical and basal spikelets.
